full_summary:
# Government Tender Notice: Responsive Maintenance Services

## Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites sealed bids from qualified contractors for the provision of responsive maintenance services for the Canadian Forces Housing Agency (CFHA) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND). The scope of work includes cost-effective maintenance and minor improvement services for the Crown-owned portfolio.

## Tender Details

* **Publication Date**: 2023-12-04
* **Tender Closing Date and Time**: 2024-02-02, 2:00 pm EST
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4211045377
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User Entity**: Department of National Defence (DND)

## Response Requirements

To be considered, offerors must submit all required supporting documentation and bid submissions by the tender closing date and time. Late bids will result in non-responsiveness.

## Description of Services

The successful contractor will provide responsive maintenance services, including cost-effective maintenance and minor improvements, in accordance with the Annex A Statement of Work. Optional teleconference sessions will be held on December 19, 2023, at 1:00 pm EST in English and on December 20, 2023, at 1:00 pm EST in French. Offerors must confirm attendance and provide the names of attending personnel.

## Contact Information

For further information on this tender, contact Carine Thibodeau Quinn, Contracting Authority, at carinethibodeau.quinn@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

This tender is subject to the [World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)] and other international trade agreements.

## Terms and Conditions

A copy of the solicitation document is available on Ariba Discovery under the SOL SPA00141879 designation. Please note that the tender closing date and time have been updated to reflect the revised closing time.

## Additional Notes

Please disregard the original posting response deadline and CanadaBuys posting closing time. The updated closing time is 2:00 pm EST on February 2, 2024.
 
Please obtain all documents from the source. The full solicitation can be found at [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18183111?extsite=MTgxODMxMTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg
